hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:There is no transitive disease, no divination, but good omen pleases me. It was said: What is good omen? He said: Sacred words

chapter.ara-name: باب الطِّيَرَةِ وَالْفَأْلِ وَمَا يَكُونُ فِيهِ الشُّؤْمُ
chapter.eng-name: (Evil) Omens And Al-Fa'l, And That Which May Be Regarded As Inauspicious
